title: We must smash the 10-year limit on egg freezing if we want women to be equal
text:
I have long held the belief that, following the advent of the contraceptive pill, modern egg freezing represents the second wave of female emancipation.

Nature has created an inequality when it comes to fertility; while men can father children well into their fifties and beyond, female fertility declines after the age of 35. We are born with a finite number of eggs, and as we age these not only decrease in quantity but also quality.

Modern egg-freezing helps women to mitigate this inequality. While it comes with no guarantee, the development of vitrification (or ‘fast-freezing’) and safer drug protocols have meant that it is now a reliable way to freeze time and bank healthy, younger eggs for...
